source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_SEQ_00<tab>Eirwel regards you expectantly.
target: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_SEQ_00<tab>スパジャイリクス医療館のエイルエルは、とても意気込んでいる。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Alisaie at the Exarch Gate.
target: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_TODO_00<tab>水晶公の門のアリゼーと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_TODO_01<tab>Use heat lures to draw out vampire bats and slay them for their fangs.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_TODO_01<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAFC201 /var>のうち3箇所に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E903901 /var>を使い
現れた<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2256E01 /var>から牙を入手

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_TODO_02<tab>Deliver bat fangs to Ryne.
target: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_TODO_02<tab>リーンに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E903A01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_TODO_03<tab>Go to the lookout in the Crystarium.
target: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_TODO_03<tab>クリスタリウムの<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAFE301 /var>で待機

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_TODO_04<tab>Speak with the Crystal Exarch.
target: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_TODO_04<tab>水晶公と話す

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALPHINAUD_000_000<tab>Riqi-Tio has duly delivered her grapes, as have I.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALPHINAUD_000_000<tab>リキ・ティオは、材料を渡せたようだね。
私の分も、しっかり納めておいたよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_005<tab>After chatting with Arkil and Eirwel here, we came to an agreement─but I'll let them explain their request themselves.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_005<tab>エイルエルたちの話を聞いて、
ちょっとした準備をしておいたわ。
けど、「依頼」はちゃんと本人からしてもらわないとね？

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_RYNE_000_010<tab>Riqi-Tio was beaming with pride when she returned.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_RYNE_000_010<tab>おかえりなさい！
リキ・ティオさん、戻ってきたとき、
とっても嬉しそうでしたよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_RYNE_000_015<tab>It may only have been a simple task, but she won't soon forget this achievement.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_RYNE_000_015<tab>……どんなに小さなことでも、
はじめてお手伝いが成功するのって、
忘れられない大切な経験になると思います。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_RIQITIO_000_020<tab>Thanks for helping with the grapes, Warrior of Darkness. In return, I promise to brew you a potion one day!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_RIQITIO_000_020<tab>「闇の戦士」さま、一緒にグレープを集めてくれてありがとう！
代わりにいつか、わたしの作ったおくすりで、
<var 08 E905 ((おねえちゃん)) ((おにいちゃん)) /var>を助けてあげるね！

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ARKIL_000_025<tab>Riqi didn't make you drink one of her grass potions, did she?
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ARKIL_000_025<tab>リキ・ティオのやつ、大丈夫だった……？
苦い草汁とか、飲まされてない？

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_CHESSAMILE_000_030<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_CHESSAMILE_000_030<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_EIRWEL_000_040<tab>Warrior of Darkness! If you've finished helping Riqi, won't you show us some fighting? Not play fighting, but honest-to-gods fighting?
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_EIRWEL_000_040<tab>「闇の戦士」さま！
リキ・ティオのお願いが終わったなら、
今度は僕たちに、ホンモノの戦い方を見せてください！

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_EIRWEL_000_041<tab>We already have some enemies that you can deal with: vampire bats! The guards say they've become a pest around the Crystarium of late.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_EIRWEL_000_041<tab>方法も、ちゃんと考えたんです……！
衛兵団の人たちが、街の周りに、
「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2256E01 /var>」が増えてるって話をしていて……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_EIRWEL_000_042<tab>We tried to sneak outside to hunt them, but the guards caught us and sent us home... But they shouldn't mind if you were doing the fighting and we were just watching!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_EIRWEL_000_042<tab>僕たちは退治に行くのを止められてしまいましたが、
<var 08 E905 ((おねえさん)) ((おにいさん)) /var>と一緒に行って、
戦うところを見学するのなら、いいと思いませんか！？

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_043<tab>The children told us as much while you were away. And in preparation, Chessamile kindly furnished us with some lures for the bats.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_043<tab>……っていう話を先に聞いてね、
「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2256E01 /var>」をおびき寄せるための道具を、
シェッサミールに用意してもらったわ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_044<tab>While the creatures won't give you any sport, bear in mind that the younglings will be watching. That's to say: put on a good show, yes?
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_044<tab>正直、あなたの相手としては不足でしょうけど、
子どもたちが手本にするって言ってるんだもの、
手は抜けないわよね……ええそうよね！

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_045<tab>Right, let's head outside at once. Everyone, follow me!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_045<tab>ということで、行くわよ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>！
チビっ子たちも、街の外までついてきなさい！

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_RYNE_000_046<tab>A-Alisaie, wait just a─ <sigh> Come on, then, children.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_RYNE_000_046<tab>アリゼーさん！？
え、えっと……みなさん、行きましょう……！

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALPHINAUD_000_050<tab>I shall remain here with Riqi-Tio. The other children, I leave in your care─my unruly sister included.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALPHINAUD_000_050<tab>さすがに戦闘となると、リキ・ティオはお留守番かな。
ここでしばらく彼女を見ておくから、
同じくらい元気な我が妹君のことは、頼んでいいかい？

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_RIQITIO_000_055<tab>What? Everyone's going outside to see you fight? <whimper> I want to watch too...
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_RIQITIO_000_055<tab>あれっ、みんなおでかけ！？
じゃあじゃあ、わたしも行き……たい……けど……うー。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_RIQITIO_000_056<tab>But...no! I have to study! I'll stay here and help Chessamile make the syrup!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_RIQITIO_000_056<tab>やっぱり、行かない！
<var 08 E905 ((おねえちゃん)) ((おにいちゃん)) /var>たちと一緒にとってきたグレープ、
どうやっておくすりにするか、見てる！

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_CHESSAMILE_000_060<tab>Be careful out there, yes? But if you can't be careful, you can always come back here.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_CHESSAMILE_000_060<tab>くれぐれも、気をつけてねぇ……。
それでも怪我をしてしまったときは、
是が非でも医療館を頼って頂戴な……？

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_RYNE_000_065<tab>It should be safe enough for the children here.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_RYNE_000_065<tab>このあたりならまだ、凶暴な獣も少ないから、
子どもたちと一緒でも安心ですね。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ARKIL_000_070<tab>We've heard the tales, but at last we can see you fight with our own eyes!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ARKIL_000_070<tab>ついに、<var 08 E905 ((おねえちゃん)) ((おにいちゃん)) /var>の戦いが見られるんだ……。
ゴクリ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_EIRWEL_000_075<tab>We've been waiting for you, Warrior of Darkness!
target: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_EIRWEL_000_075<tab>「闇の戦士」さま、よろしくお願いします！

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_080<tab>Everyone's here. Good. Let's get started, shall we?
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_080<tab>これで全員ね！
じゃ、さっそくはじめちゃいましょ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_081<tab>As their name suggests, vampire bats feed on blood. And originally being nocturnal creatures, they've grown more active with the return of night and become a nuisance.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_081<tab>標的の「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2256E01 /var>」は、動物の血を吸うそうよ。
もともと夜行性だったらしいから、
夜の闇が戻ったことで、活動範囲を広げちゃったみたい。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_082<tab>To draw them out, we'll use Chessamile's lures, which work by exploiting their heat-seeking behavior.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_082<tab>そいつらを狩るにあたって、シェッサミールから、
「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E903901 /var>」をもらってきたわ。
熱で獲物を探す習性を利用して、おびき寄せるってわけ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_083<tab>The bats are wont to nest under the eaves, so you are like to attract more if you place the lures near buildings.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_083<tab>どこに置いても構わないけど、渡せるのは3個よ。
<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2256E01 /var>は、軒下なんかに巣を作るらしいから、
建物が近い場所に置いた方が、多く集まるでしょうね。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_084<tab>I have here six lures─three each for you and me. As proof of a successful kill, I want you to gather up their fangs. Whoever collects the most is the winner!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_084<tab>……で、狩った証として、
「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E903A01 /var>」を持って帰ってきて。
私とあなた、手に入れた牙が多い方が勝ちよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_EIRWEL_000_085<tab>Oh? You're hunting too?
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_EIRWEL_000_085<tab>えっ、アリゼーさんもやるんですか？
「闇の戦士」さまだけじゃなく……？

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_086<tab>Y-Yes, well, there's nothing like friendly competition to bring out the best in <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_086<tab>ちょ、ちょっとは張り合いがあったほうが、
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>も気合が入るでしょ！

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_087<tab>Anyway! While we hunt the bats, the two of you are to stay with Ryne. She's really strong too, and will keep you safe.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_087<tab>あなたたちは、リーンと一緒に、
少し離れたところから見学してなさい。
リーンも実はかな～り強いから、心配はいらないわ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_088<tab>Without further ado, then, let the contest begin!
target: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_088<tab>それじゃあ、<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2256E01 /var>狩り開始よ！

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_RYNE_000_090<tab>Don't mind us. We'll be watching from a safe distance.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_RYNE_000_090<tab>こ、こ、子どもたちのことは、私がしっかり護ります！
ああえっと、護りながら見学させます……っ！

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ARKIL_000_095<tab>I won't blink! Not even once!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ARKIL_000_095<tab><var 08 E905 ((おねえちゃん)) ((おにいちゃん)) /var>の戦い方、よく見ておくよ。
ちゃ、ちゃんと近づきすぎないようにするってば！

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_EIRWEL_000_100<tab>So the bats nest under the eaves... It's important to know your enemy!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_EIRWEL_000_100<tab>「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2256E01 /var>」は、軒下に巣を作る……。
そっか、敵のことを知るのも大事なんですね。
勉強になります！

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_SYSTEM_000_105<tab>You are under attack!
target: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_SYSTEM_000_105<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2256E01 /var>が寄ってきた！

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ARKIL_000_110<tab>Wow! That was amazing!
target: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ARKIL_000_110<tab>め、めちゃくちゃかっこいい……！

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_EIRWEL_000_115<tab>The bats didn't stand a chance!
target: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_EIRWEL_000_115<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2256E01 /var>が一瞬で……すごい……！

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_RYNE_000_120<tab>Well fought, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! The children were hanging on your every move!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_RYNE_000_120<tab>おつかれさまです！
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんの戦う姿、
少し遠くからですが、ふたりと一緒に見てました！

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_RYNE_000_121<tab>...As was I, to be honest. Though I know the tally, may I see your fangs for good measure?
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_RYNE_000_121<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2256E01 /var>を倒した数も、わかってはいるんですが……
一応、牙をお預かりしてもいいですか？

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_122<tab>Apologies for the wait.
target: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_122<tab>おまたせ、こっちも終わったわよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_123<tab>My fangs. Not a bad haul, even if I do say so myself.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_123<tab>はい、私の集めた牙。
なかなかいい線いったと思うんだけど……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_RYNE_000_124<tab>...Five, six, seven. Seven fangs from Alisaie.
target: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_RYNE_000_124<tab>これは……全部で「7つ」ですね。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_RYNE_000_125<tab>...Which means that victory goes to <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, who collected <var 08 E802 ((<var 08 E2E8020B ((<var 09 E802 ((one)) ((two)) ((three)) ((four)) ((five)) ((six)) ((seven)) ((eight)) ((nine)) ((ten)) /var>)) ((<var 20 E802 /var>)) /var>)) ((<var 20 E802 /var>)) /var>!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_RYNE_000_125<tab>ということは、「<var 20 E802 /var>つ」集めた、
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんの勝ちです！

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_126<tab>Bah, seems you found the better spots for the lures.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_126<tab>さすがは<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>……
仕掛けるのに最適な場所を見抜いたってわけね。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_127<tab>I would be lying if I said I wasn't disappointed, but you're still within reach. I'll get the better of you next time!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_127<tab>悔しいけど……うん、それほど遠くないわ。
もっと観察眼を磨いて、次は追いつくから、覚悟してよね！

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_RYNE_000_128<tab>...Which means that we have a draw! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> also collected seven fangs!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_RYNE_000_128<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんが集めた牙も「7つ」。
よってこの勝負、引き分けです！

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_129<tab>Argh, why does this feel even worse than losing? Just another measly fang and victory would have been mine!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_129<tab>ああぁ、悔しい……！
あと一歩で、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>に勝てたのに！

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_130<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Don't look so surprised<var 1A 01 /var>! I've no intention of remaining lost in your wake forever, you know!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_130<tab>って、なに驚いてるのよ。
私だって、いつまでも後ろを歩いてるつもりはないんだからね！

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_RYNE_000_131<tab>...Which means that victory goes to Alisaie! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> collected <var 08 E802 ((<var 08 E2E8020B ((<var 09 E802 ((one)) ((two)) ((three)) ((four)) ((five)) ((six)) ((seven)) ((eight)) ((nine)) ((ten)) /var>)) ((<var 20 E802 /var>)) /var>)) ((<var 20 E802 /var>)) /var>!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_RYNE_000_131<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんが集めた牙は「<var 20 E802 /var>つ」。
この勝負、アリゼーさんの勝ちです……！

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_132<tab>Hah, I did it! I bested <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...
target: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_132<tab>やった、私の勝ち…………

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_133<tab>...In another godsdamned life! You didn't even try, did you!?
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_133<tab>なわけないでしょ！？
さてはあなた、手を抜いたわね！？

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_134<tab><sigh> And there I was taking it seriously... Spare me your pity next time, will you?
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_134<tab>私だけ真剣にやって、馬鹿みたいじゃない。
……次は、ちゃんと勝負してよね。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_135<tab>...So, children─you've now seen the Warrior of Darkness in action. What are your impressions?
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_135<tab>で、そっちはどうだったの？
「闇の戦士」様の戦いぶりは見られた？

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_EIRWEL_000_136<tab><var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var>'s incredible, miss! The bats were down before they knew it!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_EIRWEL_000_136<tab>はい、しっかりと！
衛兵団の訓練も見たことありますが、
それよりずっと、手慣れていたというか……

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_EIRWEL_000_137<tab>Our guards are strong, but the Warrior of Darkness is much, much stronger! We want to be just like <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_EIRWEL_000_137<tab>とっとと仕留めるぞ、って感じが出てて、
めちゃくちゃクールでした！

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_138<tab>Good. If you're looking for an example to emulate, you may as well pick the best.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_138<tab>よかったわね。
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>の戦いぶりと、今の気持ちを、
忘れないようしっかり胸に焼きつけておくのよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_139<tab>I want you to remember how you felt when you watched <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, and <var 1A 02 /var>train hard<var 1A 01 /var>. Keep at it for long enough and you'll be strong too.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_139<tab>そして、鍛錬を欠かさないこと。
強くなるための道なんて、結局それしかないんだから！

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_RYNE_000_140<tab>If you don't mind telling us, when did you decide that you wanted to become Warriors of Light?
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_RYNE_000_140<tab>おふたりも、いつかは「光の戦士」になりたいんですよね。
その言葉を、いったいどこで……？

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_EIRWEL_000_141<tab>Well, we were there listening with everyone when Ardbert appeared, but I've wanted to be strong since before I came to the Crystarium.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_EIRWEL_000_141<tab>僕たちも、アルバートさまの演説を聴いてたんです。
強くなりたいっていうのは、
もともと思ってたことでしたが……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_EIRWEL_000_142<tab>The sin eaters killed my father and my sister, see, and I promised myself I'd learn how to protect people one day.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_EIRWEL_000_142<tab>……僕は、クリスタリウムに来る前、
父と妹を罪喰いにやられました。
だから、今度こそ周りを護れる人になりたいんです。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_EIRWEL_000_143<tab>Like Ardbert said, this is our home. We're the ones who have to protect it. We're the ones who have to rise up as new Warriors of Light!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_EIRWEL_000_143<tab>アルバートさまは言ってました。
世界と人のために立ち上がる人が「光の戦士」なんだって。
だから、僕も……そうなりたい！

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_RYNE_000_144<tab>What about you, Arkil?
target: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_RYNE_000_144<tab>……アーキルさんは？

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ARKIL_000_145<tab>M-Me? To be honest, I'm still not sure what I want to do.
target: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ARKIL_000_145<tab>俺は……どうしたいとか、まだあんまりないんだけど……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ARKIL_000_146<tab>But if my friends were in trouble, I know that I would want to help them.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ARKIL_000_146<tab>エイルエルやリキ・ティオが危ない目にあいそうなときは、
ちゃんと助けたいって思う。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ARKIL_000_147<tab>And...I want to go on adventures with them. See the world together.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ARKIL_000_147<tab>それで……
一緒に、いろんなものを見に行きたいんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_RYNE_000_148<tab>That's a wonderful goal.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_RYNE_000_148<tab>素敵ですね。
それも、とっても立派な目標だと思います。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ARKIL_000_149<tab>You...really think so?
target: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ARKIL_000_149<tab>へへ、そうかな……ありがとう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ARKIL_000_150<tab>It's hard to explain...but it's something I felt when I saw the starshower the other day.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ARKIL_000_150<tab>この前、街の上に火の玉みたいな星が降ったのを見てたら、
なんとなく、そうしたいなって感じたんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ARKIL_000_151<tab>I felt as though...there was something I'd lost, and that I had to go out there and find it.
target: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ARKIL_000_151<tab>どこかに……何かを……探しに行かなきゃって。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_152<tab>Well, for the both of you, there's nothing for it but to train. When we return to the city, I'll teach you some exercises you can do by yourselves.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_152<tab>……だったらふたりとも、やっぱり鍛錬あるのみよ。
いくつか簡単なトレーニング方法を教えてあげるから、
街に戻りましょう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ARKIL_000_153<tab>Thanks for showing us your fighting skills, Warrior of Darkness! We'll never forget it!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ARKIL_000_153<tab>「闇の戦士」の<var 08 E905 ((おねえちゃん)) ((おにいちゃん)) /var>、
戦いを見せてくれて、本当にありがとうございました。
俺、今日のこと、絶対に忘れないから……！

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_154<tab>I understand how Arkil feels.
target: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_154<tab>アーキルの気持ち、私、ちょっとわかるのよね……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_155<tab>The starshower didn't awaken me to Hydaelyn's voice. But that vision of the Final Days, of Amaurot burning...
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_155<tab>流星雨を見ても、ハイデリンの声なんて聞こえなかったけど……
終末の光景や、アーモロートの街を見たときに感じたのは、
恐ろしさだけじゃなかったわ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_156<tab>It filled me with sadness to the very pit of my being.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_156<tab>寂しいとか……切ないとか……
そういう、胸の奥の方が、泣きだしそうな気持ち。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_157<tab>Things I once knew, people I once loved, promises I once made... It felt as though long-forgotten memories were dancing at the edges of my mind. But when I try to focus on them, they simply fade away.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_157<tab>知らないのに、知ってる。
失くしたのに、探してる。
忘れちゃった約束を、必死に思い出そうとしてるみたいな……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_158<tab>An effect of having a fractured soul, I shouldn't doubt. But lest you worry, I'm perfectly happy to <var 1A 02 /var>remain<var 1A 01 /var> fractured and have no intention of donning an Ascian mask.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_158<tab>これも、魂のどこかに焼きついてる想いなのかしら。
まあ、それでアシエン側に寝返ることはないけどね。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_159<tab><sigh> I just wish we knew what Elidibus was plotting...
target: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_159<tab>まったく……エリディブスは何を企んでるやら……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_160<tab>Hah, but look at this pair of incurable brooders... If we're going to stand around, lost in thought, we may as well do it back in the city.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_160<tab>ああ、考え込むのは街に戻ってからの方がいいわ。
こっちに来て結構たつんだし、あなたにも、
頭を整理したいときに行く「特別な場所」があるんじゃない？

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_161<tab>Rest assured, Ryne and I will take the children from here. Their heads will be in the clouds after meeting you, but we'll see to it their feet remain firmly planted on the ground.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_161<tab>子どもたちのことは、気にせず任せておいて。
張り切りすぎないくらいで、ちゃんと帰しておくわ……

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_162<tab>...!
target: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_162<tab>…………？

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_163<tab>It's nothing. Just a dizzy spell. Seems I tried a little too hard to beat you.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_163<tab>ああ、うん……ちょっと眩暈がしただけだから大丈夫。
そんなに激しい戦いをしたつもりはなかったんだけどね……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_164<tab>I'm fine now, not to worry. I'll see you soon.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_ALISAIE_000_164<tab>それじゃ、おつかれさま、「闇の戦士」様。
またあとでね！

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_SYSTEM_000_165<tab>As you ponder Alisaie's words, you are taken by an urge to revisit the scene of that fateful meeting...
target: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_SYSTEM_000_165<tab>久々に、あの場所を訪れてみようか……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_RYNE_000_170<tab>I'm so glad I found both you and the Exarch.
target: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_RYNE_000_170<tab>ここでおふたりを見つけられて、本当によかったです……！

source: TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_MYSTERYVOICE_000_180<tab>The fates seem determined not to allow us a quiet moment. But come, let us have the details from Ryne.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI102_03772_MYSTERYVOICE_000_180<tab>……穏やかじゃないな。
私との話はいつでもできる。
今は、ともかくリーンから状況を聞こう。
